Text: We are going to synthesize the information from the five interviews to create a BPMN-like textual process model. Steps: 1. Identify the roles: Accounts Payable Clerk (Mary), Purchasing Officer (Dan), Department Manager (Carlos), Accounts Payable Supervisor (Rita), and Supplier Relationship Manager (Karen). 2. List the activities and their sequence, including decision points and exceptions. 3. Note any data objects (like invoice, PO, email, etc.). 4. Handle inconsistencies and note uncertainties.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let's break down the process based on the interviews: - Start: Invoice received (by email) by Accounts Payable (Mary). - Mary checks for PO number: - If no PO -> Mary sends back to supplier (exception: missing PO). - If PO present -> Mary logs the invoice into the accounting system. - Then, Mary forwards the invoice to Purchasing (Dan) for confirmation of goods/services received and matching with PO.
